title: nine vEDu
sahitya:
Ninne vedu konnanu Venkatesha   

        Neeve makula daivamani

        



anupallavi



 Ninne pujalu seyu vadanu nenu

Ninnu vina veru daivamuledani   



caraNam



Maravaka Ni nama keerthanamu padu chunna        

        Parama bhakta kotulaku neeve    

        Prema jesi baguka brovaleda     

        Surabharani deva nannelu kovayya
